title: bad idea right? (voice memo)
lyrics:
[Intro: Olivia Rodrigo & Dan Nigro]
Good
It’s fun, and silly
We’re fun and silly people
K, ready?
[Verse]
Haven’t heard from you in a couple of months
But I’m out right now, and I’m all fucked up
And you’re calling my phone, and you’re all alone
And I’m sensing some undertones
I’m right here with all my friends
But you’re sending your new address
And I know we’re done, know we’re through
But God, when I look at you
[Pre-Chorus]
My brain goes ahh, should probably not
Can’t hear my thoughts
Like blah, blah, blah
[Chorus]
Seeing you tonight
It’s a bad idea, right?
Seeing you tonight
It’s a bad idea, right?
Seeing you tonight
It’s bad idea, right!
Seeing you tonight
You know what? Fuck it, it’s fine!
